title: Bloomberg's Townsend on Best Buy Boosted By Wearables (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Townsend on Best Buy Boosted By Wearables (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Matt Townsend, Retail Reporter for Bloomberg News, on Best Buy earnings and boosting confidence that CEO Joly can return the largest U.S. electronics retailer to consistent growth.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
